@Nephro_Sparks @drcastelino @kdjhaveri yet can separate that from the need to hold on to an underling.  It happens!
@edgarvlermamd Like the concept of "surface area"  Hard to do from a faraway office, or just at annual meetings #bestmentors
RT @Nephro_Sparks: you don't even know you have just been mentored #bestmentors #happening247
#bestmentors are available and approachable, always seem to make time. Way more important than being famous
#bestmentors are established enough in their career to not be competing with mentees, but early enough to remember what it was like
#bestmentors ideally aren't chairs/PDs/PIs, but if they are, can separate the interests of those roles
#bestmentors have a broad experience in different settings and specialties (earlier-career mentee, broader perspective needed)
#bestmentors ask about personal factors (family, geography, finances) that will influence professional decisions
@nephondemand @kidney_boy Big question but I'll take a few shots at answering #bestmentors
